CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK(Last_Enrichment_Session__c), ISBLANK(Last_Playgroup_Session__c), ISBLANK(Last_Treatment_Session__c) ), NULL, DATE(1900, 01, 01) + MAX( BLANKVALUE( Last_Enrichment_Session__c, DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) - DATE(1900, 01, 01), BLANKVALUE( Last_Playgroup_Session__c, DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) - DATE(1900, 01, 01), BLANKVALUE( Last_Treatment_Session__c, DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) - DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) )
CustomField.label: Last Out of Kennel Activity
